columns.name: name
columns.description: The user friendly name of the bucket.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN of the AWS S3 Bucket.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The date and tiem when bucket was created.

columns.name: bucket_policy_is_public
columns.description: The policy status for an Amazon S3 bucket, indicating whether the bucket is public.

columns.name: versioning_enabled
columns.description: The versioning state of a bucket.

columns.name: versioning_mfa_delete
columns.description: The MFA Delete status of the versioning state.

columns.name: block_public_acls
columns.description: Specifies whether Amazon S3 should block public access control lists (ACLs) for this bucket and objects in this bucket.

columns.name: block_public_policy
columns.description: Specifies whether Amazon S3 should block public bucket policies for this bucket. If TRUE it causes Amazon S3 to reject calls to PUT Bucket policy if the specified bucket policy allows public access.

columns.name: ignore_public_acls
columns.description: Specifies whether Amazon S3 should ignore public ACLs for this bucket and objects in this bucket. Setting this element to TRUE causes Amazon S3 to ignore all public ACLs on this bucket and objects in this bucket.

columns.name: restrict_public_buckets
columns.description: Specifies whether Amazon S3 should restrict public bucket policies for this bucket. Setting this element to TRUE restricts access to this bucket to only AWS service principals and authorized users within this account if the bucket has a public policy.

columns.name: event_notification_configuration
columns.description: A container for specifying the notification configuration of the bucket. If this element is empty, notifications are turned off for the bucket.

columns.name: server_side_encryption_configuration
columns.description: The default encryption configuration for an Amazon S3 bucket.

columns.name: acl
columns.description: The access control list (ACL) of a bucket.

columns.name: lifecycle_rules
columns.description: The lifecycle configuration information of the bucket.

columns.name: logging
columns.description: The logging status of a bucket and the permissions users have to view and modify that status.

columns.name: object_lock_configuration
columns.description: The specified bucket's object lock configuration.

columns.name: object_ownership_controls
columns.description: The Ownership Controls for an Amazon S3 bucket.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: The resource IAM access document for the bucket.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: replication
columns.description: The replication configuration of a bucket.

columns.name: website_configuration
columns.description: The website configuration information of the bucket.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to bucket.

columns.name: region
columns.description: The AWS Region in which the resource is located.
